title: Sen. Coons, Dr. Mark Hyman on Food Policy
itunes:title: Sen. Coons, Dr. Mark Hyman on Food Policy
description:
Guests: Senator Chris Coons, a Democrat from Delaware, Julia Hermann, Senior Global Strategy Analyst, Cartica Management, Brendan Buck, Partner at Seven Letter and Former Spokesman & Advisor to House Speaker Paul Ryan, Former Alaska Senator Mark Begich, Strategic Consulting Advisor at Brownstein Hyatt Farber Schreck, and Dr. Mark Hyman best selling author of "Food Fix: How to Save Our Health, Our Economy, Our Communities, and Our Planet--One Bite at a Time."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:author: Bloomberg
